[Home](http://web.archive.org/web/20250909060744/https://jacksonholehistory.org/) Visit

# Visit

## Hours

### Museum

Tuesday – Saturday: 10am – 5pm  
Sunday & Monday: Closed

### Research Center

Saturday & Sunday: Closed  
 _Must schedule appointment._

### 

## Admissions

 _Children 5 and under and History Jackson Hole Members receive free admission._

### Museum

Adults: $12  
Seniors 65+, Students: $10 

### Historic Downtown Walking Tours

 _Available seasonally, May 21 to September._  
Adults: $12  
Seniors 65+, Students: $10 

### Museum & Walking Tour Combo*

_Available seasonally, May 21 to September._  
Adults: $18  
Seniors 65+, Students: $15

 _*Must purchase museum and walking tour tickets simultaneously to receive combo pricing._

## Location

### Campus

175 E Broadway Ave.  
Jackson, WY 83001

## Downtown Walking Tours

Get to know downtown Jackson and its hidden history on a historic walking tour.

### public walking tours

On a hour-long walk, explore downtown Jackson landmarks and historic buildings with a local guide, who will share memorable stories of local events and characters.

We take up to 12 people on each scheduled tour. Tours depart from the History Museum at 175 East Broadway Ave. from May through September on Wednesday – Friday at 10:30am.

### private walking tours

Let us tailor a walking tour for your preferred time and interests. Use the form below to inquire about private walking tours.

Private tours are dependent on guide availabilit...

# History  
Jackson  
Hole

## Hours

### Museum

Tuesday – Saturday: 10am – 5pm  
Sunday & Monday: Closed

### Research Center

Saturday & Sunday: Closed  
 _Must schedule appointment._

### 

## Admissions

 _Children 5 and under and History Jackson Hole Members receive free admission._

### Museum

Adults: $12  
Seniors 65+, Students: $10 

### Historic Downtown Walking Tours

 _Closed for the season, available May to September._  
Adults: $12  
Seniors 65+, Students: $10 

### Museum & Walking Tour Combo*

_Closed for the season, available May to September._  
Adults: $18  
Seniors 65+, Students: $15

 _*Must purchase museum and walking tour tickets simultaneously to receive combo pricing._

## Location

### Campus

175 E Broadway Ave.  
Jackson, WY 83001

## Upcoming Events

Join us for Jackson Hole history-related events and exhibits for all ages at the Jackson Hole History Museum.
